full_summary:
### Valve & O-Ring Procurement

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the procurement of valves and O-rings. The tender period for this project has expired, but the business information is critical to potential future RFPs.

#### Tender Details

| Tender Title          | Valve & O-Ring Procurement        |
|------------------------|----------------------------------|
| Reference Number       | CB-8188-32472322                  |
| Amendment Number       | 1                                  |
| Solicitation Number    | W8482-242017/A                     |
| Publication Date        | August 17, 2023                    |
| Tender Closing Date     | September 8, 2023 2:00 PM EST       |
| Amendment Date          | September 8, 2023                  |
| Expected Contract Start Date | To be determined               |
| Expected Contract End Date | To be determined               |

#### Procurement Details

* **Classification**: Hardware (31160000), Valves (40141600)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

#### Articles to be Procured

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the following articles:

| Article # | Item Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
|-----------|-------------------|----------|----------------|--------------------|
| 1         | Valve, Solenoid    | 20       | EA             | CFB Halifax       |
| 2         | Valve, Solenoid    | 10       | EA             | CFB Esquimalt     |
| 3         | Valve, Diaphragm, Stop | 15  | EA             | CFB Halifax       |
| 4         | Valve, Diaphragm, Stop | 15  | EA             | CFB Esquimalt     |
| 5         | O-Ring             | 15       | EA             | CFB Halifax       |
| 6         | O-Ring             | 5        | EA             | CFB Esquimalt     |
| 7         | O-Ring             | 15       | EA             | CFB Halifax       |

#### Bidder Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number, as well as the NCAGE.
* The Crown retains the
